overview: Glenn Larsen brings to Hydra more than 20 years of experience in pre-clinical and clinical development of both proteins and small molecules. Most recently he served as Vice President Musculoskeletal Sciences and Therapeutic Area R&D Co-Chair at Wyeth Pharmaceuticals, where he directed R&D for Wyeth’s second largest therapeutic area in the fields of arthritis, inflammation and tissue regeneration. Glenn’s organization advanced 8 compounds to development track. Prior to that Glenn was Vice President Preclinical R&D leading an organization responsible for bringing drug candidates from the benchtop to the clinic and filing more than 50 INDs, and served as Senior Director Preclinical R&D at Genetics Institute with a focus on secreted proteins. Glenn earned his Ph.D. in Biochemistry at the State University of New York at Stony Brook and completed Harvard Business School’s Management Development Program.

relationships.title: Chief Operating Officer and Executive Vice President of Development
